name: Kleio
body:
# Kleio is/was a small iOS consultancy

We previously released a finance tracker called Flux. 

Kleio's sole founder and employee, @sebastian, is currently a co-founder at [aircloak](http://www.aircloak.com). Aircloak provides rich behavioral analytics without sacrificing user privacy. Go to the website for more information.

At some point in the future, kleio might spring back to life.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
